issuetype.description: A new feature of the product, which has yet to be developed.
issuetype.name: New Feature

projectCategory.description: Titanium and related SDKs used in application development
projectCategory.name: Client

status.description: The issue is open and ready for the assignee to start work on it.
status.name: Open

fields.description:
We need to support different timeout values for connect versus read operations.  Originally those timeout values were combined into a single timeout property on the socket.

Perhaps add connectTimeout, readTimeout and deprecate the existing timeout property.  Further discussion is required regarding parity and desired behavior.
fields.summary: TiAPI:  add support for TCP socket timeout options
